name: Lisa
title: Witch of Purple Rose
description: The languid but knowledgeable Librarian of the Knights of Favonius, deemed by Sumeru Akademiya to be their most distinguished graduate in the past two centuries.

normal.1: Performs up to 4 lightning attacks that deal <electro>Electro DMG</electro>.

charged.1: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to deal <electro>AoE Electro DMG</electro> after a short casting time.

plunging.1: Gathering the might of Electro, Lisa plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals <electro>AoE Electro DMG</electro> upon impact with the ground.

description.0: Channels the power of lightning to sweep bothersome matters away.
description.4: On hit, it deals <electro>Electro DMG</electro> and applies a stack of the Conductive status (max 3 stacks) to opponents in a small AoE.
description.7: After an extended casting time, calls down lightning from the heavens, dealing massive <electro>Electro DMG</electro> to all nearby opponents.
description.8: Deals great amounts of extra damage to opponents based on the number of Conductive stacks applied to them, and clears their Conductive status.
description.10: Electro Purple is the raiment of the Witch of Purple Rose.

description.0: Summons a Lightning Rose that unleashes powerful lightning bolts, launching surrounding opponents and dealing <electro>Electro DMG</electro>.
description.1: The Lightning Rose will continuously emit lightning to knock back opponents and deal <electro>Electro DMG</electro> throughout the ability's duration.
description.3: This rose is beautiful, but beware its mortal thorns.

description.0: Hits by Charged Attacks apply Violet Arc's Conductive status to opponents.
Opponents hit by Lightning Rose have their DEF decreased by 15% for 10s.
When Lisa crafts a potion, she has a 20% chance to refund a portion of the crafting materials used.
Lisa regenerates 2 Energy for every opponent hit while holding Violet Arc.
description.1: A maximum of 10 Energy can be regenerated in this manner at any one time.

description.0: Holding Violet Arc has the following effects:
Increases the Level of Lightning Rose by 3.
Lightning Rose now unleashes 1-3 lightning bolts when it attacks.
Increases the Level of Violet Arc by 3.
When Lisa takes the field, she applies 3 stacks of Violet Arc's Conductive status onto nearby opponents.
description.1: This effect can only occur once every 5s.
